definitions.title: n. pr. loc.
definitions.body: city conquered by Assyrians;—[[עַוׇּה]] 2Ki 17:24 (van d. H. [[עַוׇּא]]) = [[עִוׇּה]] 2Ki 18:34, 2Ki 19:13 = Is 37:13; LXX Aia(n), Ana, and (2Ki 19:13) Oudou, A AuUa, LXXL Ainag, etc.; site in N. Syria Wkl:Alttest. Unters. 102 f. Benz; Sachau:ZA xii (1897), 48 prop. Emma (Tab. Pent.) = )/Imma Ptol:v. 15, 15, mod. ï Imm betw. Antioch and Aleppo.—I. [[עַוׇּה]] v. sub I. [[עוה]]. p. 730
